segments.text: David , have you watched the 82nd Oscar Awards Ceremony ? Avatar got the Award of Visual Effect . The movie sounds great !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are so old-fashioned . I have already watched it last week in cinema .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Its 3D animation is attractive and its colorful scenes are also unforgettable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is said that The Hurt Locker got the Award of Best Picture . What do you think about this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , its theme is moving and profound , so from the academic aspect , this is its advantage to win the award .
segments.speaker: S2
